name: Bhagat Singh

name: Fidel Castro
description: Cuban revolutionary and politician who served as the Prime Minister of Cuba and President of Cuba. Led the Cuban Revolution and established the first communist state in the Western Hemisphere.

name: Frantz Fanon
description: Martiniquais psychiatrist, philosopher, radical pan-Africanist and humanist. Theorized the psychology of colonialism and the role of violence in decolonization. Influential in post-colonial studies.

name: George Padmore
description: Marxist thinker and theorist in the tradition of national liberation.

name: Harry Haywood
description: Marxist thinker and theorist in the tradition of national liberation.

name: Ho Chi Minh
description: Vietnamese revolutionary and politician. President of North Vietnam and founder of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam. Led the Vietnamese independence movement against French colonial rule.

works.title: Path Which Led Me to Leninism
